relation: ThinkPad Battery 59+ (T400s Series 6 Cell) Compatible with T410s, T400
pageTitle: ThinkPad Battery 59+ (6 Cell) for T410s & T400 | Lenovo
textBeforeTable: Over-discharge protection Standard system battery specifications Six-cell, rechargeable system battery, 11.1 V dc, 3.9 Ah Lithium-Ion (Li-Ion) technology   Compatible with T400s, T410s Stay unplugged for longer with the ThinkPad T400s Series 6-Cell Battery. This rechargeable battery uses Lithium-Ion (Li-Ion) technology and can be used as a replacement for ageing system batteries or as a convenient spare battery.
